alert.note: Alert for Bordeaux, Chugwater, Wheatland; Goshen, Middle-Lower North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 01 at 2:13AM MDT until November 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM MDT TODAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417...418 AND 434... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FOR WEDNESDAY NOON TO 6 PM FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FWZS 417...418...432...433...434... 435 AND 436... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 432...433...435 and 436... * WIND...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts around 35 mph Wednesday. * HUMIDITY...Around 12-15 percent Wednesday afternoon. * HAINES...4 to 5 * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bordeaux, Chugwater, Wheatland; Goshen, Middle-Lower North Platte River Basin
